p: According to Tavares and Ferreira [ 50], 4â€“5 mL of Deuterated Chloroform (CDCl 3) was added in an aliquot of 0.6 mL of the sample. It was inserted to obtain the fids while processing the spectra in a 9.4 T (400 MHz to H), Bruker brand, model DRX400, with a temperature of 300 K, and a 5 mm reverse detection probe. Hydrogen ( 1H) and carbon ( 13C) spectra was also used.
